name: A Parliament Is A Machine For Living In
description:
This is a fully navigable metaverse NFT. It serves as an extension of the original 1/1 piece of the same name on Foundation: https://foundation.app/yungtochan

It is recommended you visit the parliament via a web browser (Firefox preferred), using headphones, a mouse and WASD keys.

--

On the 6th of January 2021, the US Capitol was under attack.

This artwork revisits the attack via orthographic projection, borrowing from Modernist architect Le Corbusier’s 1923 slogan “A house is a machine for living in”.
